descriptionHtml:
This mod allows you to harvest firewood around Skyrim. You may ask yourself: haven’t we got Frostfall for picking that up already?
Yes, but this mod increases the harvesting possibilities, and does not modify Frostfall  in any way!
You have to just stand close to a tree, and press the Interaction key, like you do to harvest the usual alchemical ingredients from flowers, etc…
You will find a wood log in your inventory to use when you need it, to sell it or to burn it.
Link italian mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31588
author: Snake_71
